text: Then the leaders of the Ammon people-group realized that they had greatly insulted [IDM] David [IDM]. So they sent some men to hire/pay some soldiers from other nearby areas to help defend them. They hired 20,000 soldiers from the  Beth-Rehob and Zobah regions northeast of Israel, and 12,000 soldiers from the  Tob region, and 1,000 soldiers from the army of the king of Maacah region.
